blueprint.label: Sludge & Thermal Water Processing
blueprint.description:
This requires two mods:
https://mods.factorio.com/mod/crafting_combinator
https://mods.factorio.com/mod/LTN_Content_Reader

Be sure to re-import the blueprint book after installing the mods!

Each thermal water block needs 1200 filter frames dropped in the chest.  Assembler-3s can be temporarily reduced to Assembler-2s if necessary.

DUE TO A MOD BUG, NOTE THE POSITION AND CONNECTION OF THE TWO LTN COMBINATORS.  REMOVE THEM, PLACE THEM MANUALLY, SET ID=255, AND RECONNECT GREEN WIRE.
